description: Secure Elements Class 5 AVR client (aka C5 EVM) before 2.8.1 generates predictable CEIDs, which allows remote attackers to determine the CEID of a protected asset, which can be used in other attacks against AVR.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-2713

description: Secure Elements Class 5 AVR client (aka C5 EVM) before 2.8.1 does not validate the CEID of an incoming message, which allows remote attackers to send messages to a protected asset without knowing the proper CEID.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-2714

description: The Administration Console in Secure Elements Class 5 AVR (aka C5 EVM) before 2.8.1 does not enforce access control, which allows remote attackers to gain access to servers via the console.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-2715

description: Secure Elements Class 5 AVR server (aka C5 EVM) before 2.8.1 uses a hard-coded user ID and password, which allows remote attackers to gain access to the server.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-2716

description: Unspecified vulnerability in Secure Elements Class 5 AVR client and server (aka C5 EVM) before 2.8.1 allows authenticated attackers to overwrite arbitrary files (1) on a server during an update or (2) on a client via modified pathnames, possibly due to a directory traversal issue.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-2717

description: JIWA Financials 6.4.14 passes a Microsoft SQL Server account's username and password, and the name of a data source, to a Crystal Reports .rpt file, which allows remote authenticated users to execute certain standard stored procedures by referencing them in a user-written .rpt file, as demonstrated by using a stored procedure that provides the username and cleartext password of every account.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-2718

description: JIWA Financials 6.4.14 stores usernames and passwords for all accounts in cleartext in the HR_Staff table in Microsoft SQL Server, and sends the usernames and passwords in cleartext to the application's SQL Server ODBC driver, which might allow context-dependent attackers to obtain the passwords.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-2719

description: SQL injection vulnerability in news.php in VARIOMAT allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the subcat parameter.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-2720

description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in news.php in VARIOMAT allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary HTML or web script via the subcat parameter.  NOTE: this issue might be resultant from SQL injection.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-2721

description: SQL injection vulnerability in view_album.php in SelectaPix 1.4 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via unknown vectors.  NOTE: the provenance of this information is unknown; the details are obtained solely from third party sources.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-2722

description: Unspecified versions of Mozilla Firefox allow remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) via a web page that contains a large number of nested marquee tags.  NOTE: a followup post indicated that the initial report could not be verified.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-2723

X for Mac allows user-assisted attackers to execute arbitrary code via a PowerPoint document with a malformed record, which triggers memory corruption.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-0025

description: The strnlen_user function in Linux kernel before 2.6.16 on IBM S/390 can return an incorrect value, which allows local users to cause a denial of service via unknown vectors.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-0456

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-1313

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-1467

description: Unspecified vulnerability in Apple File Protocol (AFP) server in Apple Mac OS X 10.4 up to 10.4.6 includes the names of restricted files and folders within search results, which might allow remote attackers to obtain sensitive information.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-1471

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-2193

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-2195

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-2196

description: Integer overflow in wv2 before 0.2.3 might allow context-dependent attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted Microsoft Word document.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-2197

description: OpenOffice.org (aka StarOffice) 1.1.x up to 1.1.5 and 2.0.x before 2.0.3 allows user-assisted attackers to conduct unauthorized activities via an OpenOffice document with a malicious BASIC macro, which is executed without prompting the user.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-2199

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-2200

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-2308

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-2309

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-2310

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-2311

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-2370

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-2371

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-2373

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-2374

description: SQL injection vulnerability in the do_mysql_query function in core.php for Open Searchable Image Catalogue (OSIC) before 0.7.0.1 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary SQL commands via multiple vectors, as demonstrated by the (1) type parameter in adminfunctions.php and the (2) catalogue_id parameter in editcatalogue.php.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-2748

description: SQL injection vulnerability in search.php in Open Searchable Image Catalogue (OSIC) 0.7.0.1 and earlier allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary SQL commands via the (1) txtCustomField and (2) CustomFieldID array parameters.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-2749

description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the do_mysql_query function in core.php for Open Searchable Image Catalogue (OSIC) before 0.7.0.1 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts or HTML via failed SQL queries, which is reflected in an error message.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-2750

description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Open Searchable Image Catalogue (OSIC) 0.7.0.1 and earlier allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts or HTML via the item_list parameter in search.php.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-2751

description: The RedCarpet /etc/ximian/rcd.conf configuration file in Novell Linux Desktop 9 and SUSE SLES 9 has world-readable permissions, which allows attackers to obtain the rc (RedCarpet) password.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-2752

description: SQL injection vulnerability in MySQL 4.1.x before 4.1.20 and 5.0.x before 5.0.22 allows context-dependent attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via crafted multibyte encodings in character sets such as SJIS, BIG5, and GBK, which are not properly handled when the mysql_real_escape function is used to escape the input.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-2753

description: Stack-based buffer overflow in st.c in slurpd for OpenLDAP before 2.3.22 might allow attackers to execute arbitrary code via a long hostname.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-2754

description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in index.php in UBBThreads 5.x and earlier allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the debug parameter, as demonstrated by stealing MD5 hashes of passwords.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-2755

description: Eitsop My Web Server 1.0 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) via a long GET request.  NOTE: CVE analysis suggests that this is a different product, and therefore a different vulnerability, than CVE-2002-1897.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-2756

description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Chipmunk guestbook allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the (1) start parameter in (a) index.php; (2) forumID parameter in index.php, (b) newtopic.php, and (c) reply.php; and (3) ID parameter to (d) edit.php.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-2757

description: Directory traversal vulnerability in jetty 6.0.x (jetty6) beta16 allows remote attackers to read arbitrary files via a %2e%2e%5c (encoded ../) in the URL.  NOTE: this might be the same issue as CVE-2005-3747.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-2758

description: jetty 6.0.x (jetty6) beta16 allows remote attackers to read arbitrary script source code via a capital P in the .jsp extension, and probably other mixed case manipulations.

description: SQL injection vulnerability in modules.php in 4nNukeWare 4nForum 0.91 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the tid parameter.

description: SQL injection vulnerability in Hitachi HITSENSER3 HITSENSER3/PRP, HITSENSER3/PUP, HITSENSER3/STP, and HITSENSER3/EUP allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via unknown attack vectors.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-2761

description: PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability in includes/config.php in WebCalendar 1.0.3 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL in the includedir parameter, which is remotely accessed in an fopen call whose results are used to define a user_inc setting that is used in an include_once call.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-2762

description: SQL injection vulnerability in Pre News Manager 1.0 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the (1) id parameter to (a) index.php, and the (2) nid parameter to (b) news_detail.php, (c) email_story.php, (d) thankyou.php, (e) printable_view.php, (f) tella_friend.php, and (g) send_comments.php.  NOTE: the provenance of this information is unknown; the details are obtained solely from third party information.  It is possible that this is primary to CVE-2006-2678.
